It's worth to remember that ghost dog is not an assasin just because he wanted, his master (as he calls him) is a mobster who employs him for assasinations, and he obey without asking, as a samurai was expected to, what is worth to bear in mind is that ghost dog always follows the way of the samurai, to the very end, he knew the consequence of killing the entire family of gangsters, and he accepted it, as a samurai was expected to.
